text:

(2) Viewing southeastward. Shown in the background is a cofferdam under construction.

(3) An additional view.

P. L. Sperr.

text:
Great Kills (Staten Island): Shown is the dock, near Nelson Avenue, which serves as a boat landing for the motor boats shuttling back and forth to Crooke's Point.
View 1: May 2, 1937
View 2: August 1, 1937

P. L. Sperr

(3)
A barge grounded by high wind in the Great Kills.

P. L. Sperr
